website_summaries.verdict: With a nice collection of roadside emergency essentials bookended by an easy-to-charge flashlight, this kit is a surprising find at low price.
pros: Handcrank-charged LED flashlight is an unexpected plus at this kit’s price point, users find
Bag has enough room to add extra items, and holds up well stored in the trunk
cons: Tire pressure gauge is on the flimsy side, owners note
Reports of missing items on delivery
Flashlight breaks easily, some owners feel
Most users have to upgrade or add safety and first-aid items

customer_reviews.title: NICE KIT
customer_reviews.text: I shopped several different types of these "very good to have in the car" kits from several different manufacturers and I think this one is the best, both in price and the items it contained. There are only two things that I thought it should have had in the kit: one is a "window breaker-seat belt cutter" and the other is a couple of flares. Both of these I bought separately and added to the kit.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY

customer_reviews.title: Smartest Purchase on Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smartest purchase I have made on Amazon. Great and small because I have a small car and don't need anything extra large! I added some pictures to show how small and convenient the kit is.
customer_reviews.author: JB Adams

customer_reviews.title: Ok basic starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a relative for the holidays. This is an ok kit with a variety of items inside the canvas bag but realistically the bag felt pretty empty with some of the additions that counted as part of the 66 items. Some of the quality of the individual pieces could be better quality as well, as some items feel pretty cheaply made. It also could use a few more additions to it, such as a fire extinguisher and tire flat repair. With that being said, this is a decent starter kit for the price and will work in an emergency, but don’t expect high quality items that will last a long time in this basic kit. 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: JWINK

customer_reviews.title: The Right Gift
customer_reviews.text: I selected this as the White Elephant office Christmas gift. It was passed around to several people, until it landed with a handicapped lady in my office. She informed me that her emergency road kit was stolen from her car. She had never gotten around to replacing it. She told me for her, this was the right gift. She plans to add to it (blanket, k-rations, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: N. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency bag
customer_reviews.text: A great little kit to use in case of emergencies. However, I broke down on the side of the road and it turns out it was my battery and it died. When I used the jumper cables to jump the vehicle they melted and was not a bigger gauge so I would be highly aware of that when jumping a vehicle or just get a new pair to put in there.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The bag is nice and it is easy to fit everything inside even ...
customer_reviews.text: This has everything that I need to feel safe traveling long distances. I know that if I were to get a flat tire or have other mechanical issues, I would be visible to oncoming traffic with the vest and the reflective triangle would also alert vehicles to my presence. The jumper cables in this kit look to be of decent quality. I had recently lost my previous cables to a coworker who needed them but never returned them. I took advantage of the situation to go ahead and buy a whole set. The bag is nice and it is easy to fit everything inside even though it looks like there would be no way once you take everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic kit for the price, needs better jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: A was a little concerned about buying sight unseen but happy that I did buy it. It comes with most every thing you need for an emergency on the road. I ditched the cables immediately for heftier ones and added my own personal items for winter use. I’ll probably change those personal items come summer. But that’s just me. This kit fills the basic emergency needs (except For the jumper cables hence the 4 stars). The bag is big enough to add a DC tire pump, bag of ice melt, sand, some added first aid items, more robust cables, a multi wrench, and a hand trowel with some space left.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Maginnis

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT gift for the drivers in your family
customer_reviews.text: I've seen similar kits for twice the price and the carry bag is surprisingly rugged - I was expecting a flimsy thing that would tear easily. All the items listed were present and accounted for and I couldn't think of a more perfect gift for my sis-in-law who recently got a driving job. If I were to fault anything in this kit it would probably be the tire pressure gauge. It is one of the fairly flimsy, cheap varieties that have a notoriously inaccurate little plastic stick acting as the gauge. Since it's not a particularly critical item from a safety standpoint (if your tire's flat, you don't need a gauge to tell you) it's a pretty minor drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Lianimals

customer_reviews.title: Multiple missing and damaged components!
customer_reviews.text: Although the kit arrived zip-tied shut in the box, it was missing several items: The "Stainless steel multi tool" the "Accident report form" and the electrical tape. The tire pressure gauge does not appear to be functional. Since one of the reasons I bought this was because it had a multitool, I'm annoyed. Would not buy again. I'll not return it, since I do not have time right now. I'll have to replace the missing and damaged components myself.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Basics
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a new car for around-town driving, so I wanted to have helpful gear handy should a situation arise. This package is ideal for a relatively safe driving envirnoment - stuck in a jam with help relatively nearby - and at a great value. I say this because my old war horse I take out for camping would already be equipped with more extensive necessities that folks have noted previously - water, e-tool, fire-starter, land-nav / compass, lighting, all that stuff. If you aren't out in the middle of nowhere, this kit has the basic necessities any driver should need.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one about 2 years ago for my sister and just purchased it again for my new car. I'm super happy with how it came. My sister has had her battery die on her a few times (she finally replaced it) and these cable ties were handy each time. We've been blessed to only need the emergency triangles once before and hopefully we'll never need anything else but if we are ever in a situation, we're prepared. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. I've already used the tire guage and multi-tool. Both seem sturdy, nice quality. I liked this kit for the reflector triangle, safety vest, poncho and blanket. There is room in the bag for fix-a-flat, that I added.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for a new driver
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nephew when he got his first car. It's a good start for an emergency kit. I added a few more items like a real knife, a good flashlight, more bungees, more zip ties and some trash bags. Overall a decent value. 4 stars because some of the items felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Battery Booster Cable which is included into the kit is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Battery Booster Cable which is included into the kit is junk. 8 Gauge, 8 feet - should I say more? Today it just melted when trying to jump start the car on the road. Other that that the kit is great
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Room for other things that you might want to add, but fairly complete kit.
customer_reviews.text: This has almost everything that I need in a roadside emergency bag. Purchased a separate first aid kit, as I wanted something more extensive and put the first aide bits in that kit. There's space in the bag for the few tools that I've put in there and there's still space for more. Added a second mylar blanket, a few chemical hand warmers, a couple of bottles of water, and tire iron to the kit, so I feel pretty good in case I breakdown or my car won't start. Have a jack in the trunk, but that wouldn't fit in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency bag for vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Good size for easy storage in the vehicle. May need to add a few items to personalize the bag for your travel (radio, high vis flair, extra gloves). Good items included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: G.W.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for all cars.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as part of an emergency kit for my second car. It has all the necessities I could think of, plus a few extras. The entire kit is surprisingly small for everything that it contains. Would absolutely recommend this over the AAA brand ones that have less for more. Do know that the contents inside are not necessarily top shelf quality, but in a pinch (which is what the kit is intended for), these will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a really great idea. There really is all of this stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Now that my kids are grown and have families of their own, we have decided to do white elephant gifts for the adults. This year I bought this kit. It was the most stolen gift and everyone wanted to know where I had got. Thought it was a really great idea. There really is all of this stuff in it and everything is very handy. I did include a bigger first aid kit that came in its own case. Very good product and very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: the entire package, I love it sooo much, it is so fluffy!!! Everything you could need in an emergency - as if a good friend puts a package together and you know you are having the essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Trumpfheller

customer_reviews.title: Did it for Jeremy, James, and Richard!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun thing to find on my doorstep. I opened it up and it comes with everything as advertised. Easy enough to plop in the trunk and use for when I need it. Sad that Jeremy, Richard, and James aren't the hosts, but purchased in memory of! Purchase it, you'll need one when the emergency hits.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ramacho

customer_reviews.title: I'm officially car emergency ready!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything I think I would need in a car emergency. I'm going to add extra emergency blankets because I'm prepper OCD like that. I comes in a great carry case for storage in my trunk AND it has a cool "I am the Stig" window cling which will be the envy of all who see it! I think this was the best thing I got on Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn the Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact, thorough kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little emergency roadside kit for the car. Contains all sorts of things you may need that I wouldn't have ever thought of to buy. Really convenient. And is all housed in a small, sturdy, attractive carrying bag that fits everything very well...and even has a little room left over in case you want to add more items to the kit yourself. I paid $34.95 for this kit.
customer_reviews.author: AnnML

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for a great price.  And it's Top Gear!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of very useful items for a kit of this size for the price. A lot of times these packages with big item count numbers have a ton of little things you don't really need so they can advertise how many pieces the kit has. This actually has MANY useful items without an overabundance of things you'll never need. Definitely good for new cars/drivers!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phreak

customer_reviews.title: Road Trip Essential
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Road trip across the US. Well it ended up saving our butts! My ford focus had a hanging plastic cover in the front and we used the Zip Ties in this bag to hang it back up! The bag is awesome and everything inside is as described! Defenitely good to have for a road trip!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this set because I was driving across the country and it made sense to have safety items for the trip. Luckily, the set was not needed on the trip but it is still a good thing to have in the car....especially as I am new to a desert environment.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goodrich-Pavesich

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment and nice looking carry bag.
customer_reviews.text: This has just about everything you might need if you suffer a mechanical breakdown and the price is reasonable. Much cheaper than trying to build it yourself. Nice safety reflective carry bag. Don't stress over the many choices; just purchase this one and travel with confidence. Black bag with orange handles looks sporty.
customer_reviews.author: elmoinblue

customer_reviews.title: Best assistance package for the money
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical of buying this product because of the top gear branding. I love top gear as a TV show but thought this would be a bit overrated. I was very wrong and needless to say this is probably the best bang for your buck assistance package you can buy on Amazon. It doesn't have everything, but it comes with everything you'll probably end up needing when the situation arises. Compared to other assistance packages this one really stands out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Protect what you love!
customer_reviews.text: Gud kit for a newer/younger driver's car. Some pieces are flimsy and some cud be replaced with more useful components but it's a gud value.
customer_reviews.author: dralexy

customer_reviews.title: Jumper cable too short
customer_reviews.text: The jumper cable is too short to be usable. It will only work two passenger cars next to each other facing opposite way. If your cars are in a two car garage facing same direction, it will be really hard to make it work. Not wanting to deal with troubles in different situations, I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jewoo Cha

customer_reviews.title: Must have emergency kit for everyone..
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of top gear, and this kit has everything I need. I keep it in my miata and it hardly takes up space in my trunk. It is very useful, and the stig sticker is awesome!! I will buy it again as gifts for a couple of my friends..
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! All of the products are surprisingly great quality! The flashlight is battery-less which is a seldom find in kits under $50. Everything is packaged well. Mine came with an expiration date of a little over two years. The bag is durable, with plenty of extra room to add more things. I would recommend adding more bungees, a window breaker/seat belt cutter, duct tape, trash bags, and some water.
customer_reviews.author: AppleG

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get a lot of goodies. It is NOT a rebuild your engine and perform surgery during the zombie apocalypse kit so don't expect to get one for this price. It is a handy kit to have when you need it. Everyone should have one of these or a similar kit in every vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ofc. Tap

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd want in an assistance kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a new car and am very glad I did. Although I have not needed any of the materials it is good to have peace of mind that they are there if needed. I bought the Lebogner backseat/trunk organizer spread the kit out.
customer_reviews.author: Nic.S

customer_reviews.title: Entire first aid kit and poncho missing
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed that the bag I received was missing both the emergency ponchos and the entirety of the first aid kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mkgresham

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for the price. It is what I expected, not the cheapest products but you can also tell that the kit contents are not top of the line. Perfectly good for most roadside emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of the Necessities
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but a lot of the necessities all in one kit
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is a new driver with his own car. He was so happy to receive it and couldn't believe how much is in it. The bag it comes in appears to be good quality and I feel better about him being on the road better equipped for emergencies. Excellent packaging and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Roadside Kit
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but no parts are missing and I have played with the flashlight a bit. It's not the highest of quality so it would probably be a good idea to save it for an emergency. Just check out the reusable items before you have to use them. For the price a great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Cucylowsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit and hood value
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 of these for my fleet of cars. This is a good kit with decent quality components.
customer_reviews.author: mrfixit

customer_reviews.title: Good buy overall
customer_reviews.text: A pretty complete kit. Nice carry bag. But the triangles are tiny, flimsy and not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: TXBiker

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit and Gives This Mom Some Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: This road side kit was purchased as a gift for my son. We liked what all cane in the kit and that there is room to add other important items. As a mom, I feel better knowing he has items readily available for different scenarios that may occur. As my other children get cars, I will purchase this set again.
customer_reviews.author: yestheyrallmine

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed in a bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage daughter Has everything she might need Incase she breaks down
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Roadside Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent roadside kit for emergencies! Good quality items in the kit. Reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: GDT

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit for the price. Well thought out and has an extensive list of items you WILL need not a bunch of junk you won't. The absolute best part is the Stig sticker. First thing I used.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Hoping to never need
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my grandson as he starts to drive. He hasn't needed it, but feel better knowing he has some tools when and if he does.
customer_reviews.author: Toni K. Kief

customer_reviews.title: Top Gear Premium Roadside Assistance Kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a holiday gift for a family member and was well received. Very good delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Schottler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: All of the equipment fits nicely into a tidy, compact zippered case. Great starter pack for keeping in the car. I added the ultimate tool to mine, Duct Tape. Great product and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms A. Dema

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used anything but the jump cables, it's better to have it laying around in the trunk, just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Olexii

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed, compact, everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the hidden compartment of my BMW. It has a lot of extras and good things to have in the event of an emergency. I'll probably never use it aside from the bandaids, but I'd rather have it when I need it than not have it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I did add a few things like bandaids, hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 16 year old, new driver to keep in his car for emergencies. I did add a few things like bandaids, hand sanitizer, etc, but the bag had plenty of room to hold the extras. Great value and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LHarkness

customer_reviews.title: Good contents, compact bag
customer_reviews.text: Compare the contents of a roadside kit rather than just the number of pieces. This kit has a lot more useful items than some of the kits advertising more pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Used the glow lights too and I would like to get more
customer_reviews.text: used the car juper cables and it worked perfectly. Used the glow lights too and I would like to get more. Thankful for the crank flashlight it was a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Nell

customer_reviews.title: Hope to keep the second one
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. So did the guy who stole my first one... I liked it enough to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Stacewizer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount you get
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need. Bought this for my son when he got his license. Great price for the amount you get! We haven't had to use any of it yet, which is great but the quality of the stuff seems as expected. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: MOMOF3

customer_reviews.title: A 16th birthday surprise for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Given to my grandson along with keys to my older Tahoe as a surprise for his 16th birthday. I am sure this kit will come in handy. Had so many useful items in it - great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Z.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this and ended up getting him more car ...
customer_reviews.text: For my nephew as a gift. He's a new driver. I was disappointed in this and ended up getting him more car stuff to make up for it 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Has most everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: For $30, I think this is a good kit and plan to get one for my son to put into his car too. The bag is very sturdy and it is NOT full so you can add other items you'd like to keep in your car like the seat belt cutter, an expanded first aid kit, etc. We had a kit like this with emergency flares and those corroded over time and ruined everything else in the kit. This kit has those breakable glow-in-the-dark sticks that are individually wrapped. Probably safer over the long run. So I like it and I'm buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful Design

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: ...except maybe a can of fix-a-flat...which is an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Curls

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The product (Top Gear Roadside Kit) arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety of items
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter when she purchased her first car. Excellent variety of items. Packaged well in a convenient bag. In my opinion, it was a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nay

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination. Quality seems pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice combination. Quality seems pretty good. Haven't needed it yet. A little bulkier than it needs to be. Wish the bag was a little smaller so it would fit under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I feel like you get a lot of items in this kit ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you get a lot of items in this kit and it is very affordable. Definitely a good kit to have in your car in case of emergency's, and the bag is big enough to add a few extra items of your own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! It came packeaged well
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! It came packeaged well. I have used this multiple times and every piece is perfect! Best road side gear ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Morgan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very Good, going to long drive for thanks giving trip SD - CA. This road kit make me feel simply safe. It is all about "just incase" and what in the kit is just perfect if I need use.
customer_reviews.author: mikyeong chun

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: great quality for the price. i keep it in my trunk. i had to recently use the jumper cables and they worked great. i will be buying another for my husbands truck and brothers car
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Beatty

customer_reviews.title: This one contains pretty much all the basic stuff one would need in ...
customer_reviews.text: This one contains pretty much all the basic stuff one would need in an emergency situation while being on the road...Just good stuff...Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ANDERSON DELVA

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have the piece of mind that when an ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have the piece of mind that when an emergency does happen, you will be better prepared with this kit than without. My kit did not have any missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyefan93

customer_reviews.title: This set was amazing. The quality of everything was wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This set was amazing. The quality of everything was wonderful. i bought6 it for my mother, but am now going to buy one for myself, son, and husband. Seriously a great product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: April Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use any of the items for an actual emergency yet, but going through the bag it seems to be just as advertised. The quality certainly seems high enough to actually be useful and the kit contained everything it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ness

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this kit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this kit. Feel like I got a lot for my money's worth. It came with a Stig decal, which I was not expecting! 4 stars because I really would have liked a seatbelt cutter. Found one for 2 bucks and bought it, so it's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Use as a gift for teenagers and for baby shower gifts - they were a HIT!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for gifts, one for sixteen-year-old grandson and one as a baby shower gift for great-grandchild. They were both a huge hit! I told them I gave them to them not because I think they're bad drivers, but because if an accident occurs help and a form of protection at right there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little kit.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the makeshift "emergency kits" I have seen in the past, great buy! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey303

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, Great Items
customer_reviews.text: Received this kit comes with just about everything you need for the road if ever in a pinch. I added some items like water packs and energy bars. Great bag to customize and carry whenever you're on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan V.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriends car. He really likes it! A lot of stuff comes in it for the price and the bag is nice and doesn't take up a lot of space in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality stuff inside
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is described. Bought for my little sister to keep in her car and I feel better now that she has it. Everything inside looks like it is good quality
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: The best bag for the pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described. I like that there is room to add more things to the bag, which I did (a few more first aid items). The little flashlight included is pretty awful though. It does not seem to hold no matter what I do. However, for the price it's listed at I think that it is absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: William Rather

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our son's first car
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our son's first car. Has everything that an emergency kit could need at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bork

customer_reviews.title: Nice and complete
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete roadside emergency bag. Momma bear is kinda a safety freak.
customer_reviews.author: c. hogue

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great items in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my son who travels quite a bit. Feel much safer knowing he has this. Lots of great items in the bag! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for the price. Everything was of reasonable quality. Perfect for our teenage daughter and her older car! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: everything seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: This product came with everything as pictured. I haven't had to use, will change the review based on actual use. So far, everything seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: A Must have
customer_reviews.text: I placed my kit in the car, I think this is a MUST have in particular for people living in "depressing areas like Cleveland where the winter is so annoying........
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Father's Day to me
customer_reviews.text: Happy Father's Day to me. Hoping to never need it. Lots of stuff in a small kit. Anticipate it working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: EMERGENCY
customer_reviews.text: everything you need in an emergency well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son who is a new driver has everything he needs for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Small thing but really a must for the car . Very happy with it . Has everything I need in case of emergency .
customer_reviews.author: Artur Stefaniuk

customer_reviews.title: Includes everything you would need!
customer_reviews.text: Havn't really had to use it yet, but its a great kit to have around if something were to go wrong. Also it doesnt take much room in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: SebbyC

customer_reviews.text: Very affordable all in one solution for car emergencies. Added in a few extra things like a bottle etc and still had room in the bag.

customer_reviews.text: Has everything I need, especially helpful for anything that might happen with the snowy weather here in New Hampshire.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Woman
customer_reviews.text: For a girl with a lack of car care safety knowledge, this kit and it's directions/explanation of items truly helped me feel a little safer.

product_meta.title: Top Gear Premium Roadside Assistance Kit (66-piece)
product_meta.description: Size:66-pieceThe GearTOP Premium Roadside kit is filled with items that are essential for any vehicle. The Battery Booster Cables are high quality cables, that will get your car back on the road. The 14 function multi-tool takes the place of many common items and allows space for many additional items. The kit also contains a warning triangle, electrical tape, cotton work gloves, a mini first aid kit, and many other items.
feature_bullets: Top Gear Branded Carrying Case - Bag color may vary
Hand Charged LED Flashlight - no batteries required
